item.title: George Clooney, who said Joe Biden didn’t recognise him at a fundraiser, publicly called on the president to drop out of the 2024 race in a July New York Times op-ed. Less than two weeks later, Biden stepped aside for Kamala Harris.#GeorgeClooney #JoeBide
item.description: George Clooney, who said Joe Biden didn’t recognise him at a fundraiser, publicly called on the president to drop out of the 2024 race in a July New York Times op-ed. Less than two weeks later, Biden stepped aside for Kamala Harris.#GeorgeClooney #JoeBide
